tool_description: This API also works for download Youtube videos for different qualities 360p 720p 1080p etc.  in json formate you can use it very easily
name: utyube-downloader
title: utyube-downloader

api_list.name: utube-downloader API documenttion
api_list.description: Utube-downloader is a free API to download youtube video from a link in different qualities, You can send request with GET method very easily and it will return you a json object and in json object first key contains the length of arrays and seocnd key videos contains the array of urls.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://utyube-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/fetch?url=YOUR_VIDEO_LINK"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "utyube-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://utyube-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/fetch?url=YOUR_VIDEO_LINK"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "utyube-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
